:::Child sat down curiously. whet was vulois going to do? he waited. there 
was a tingling on  the space where Vulois's hand touched his face, and odd 
yet pleasant feeling. Then the feeling grew, and grew. Joy and power flooded 
his body. the world was a new! what was happening he still had no idea, but 
the burden of knowledge  was lifted. The knowledge remained, but he felt no 
burden from it. he was in bliss. As the energy filled him all pain exited his 
body glowed. his world became a wonderful balance of peace and happiness 
nothing could stop him. if you looked at Him threw an Amber spy glass you 
would have seen a world of light. The energy roared within him and it still 
grew. That was when the matrix spoke:::

"And Jeramy said onto them 'live in the glory of god in the highest, Maker of 
heaven and earth!' and the night sky was alight with a thousand singing 
angles in all there glory!"

:::And child began, unintentionally to sing. His sweet soprano tearing the 
night sky with joy:::

Child:  'oh come to me angels'
    'Sing on high the holy one'
    'And let there be peace on.. to...'
                'The world!'
